revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Synology |model=RT1900ac |revision=(R1) |asin=B01773J9JU |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now |fcc_date=06/17/2015 |fcc_id=YOR-RT1900AC, YOR-RT1900ACR1 |ic_id=20954-RT1900ACR1 |pcb_id= |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM58622 |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=THGBMBG5D1KBAIT |fla2=1 |fla2_brand=STMicro |fla2_model=ST25P80VG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646Q-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43460;BCM43460KMLG, TE1449 P20, 436287-29 3 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43460;BCM43460KMLG, TE1449 P20, 436287-29 3 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier (PAM);Skyworks;SE2623L;;3; ,,, 2.4GHz Low Noise Amplifier (LNA);Skyworks;SKY15971;;3; ,,, 2.4GHz (0.5-6GHz) SPDT Switch;Skyworks;SKY13377;;3; ,,, 5GHz Front End Module (FEM);RFMD;RFFM4552;;3; ,,, USB 2.0 Interface Flash Card Reader Controller;Genesys;GL836;;1; |flags=SD Card slot |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=SynologyRouter |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:11:32 |oui_eth=00:11:32 }} {{TagLine|Synology RT1900ac Wireless Router}} :[https://www.synology.com/en-global/products/RT1900ac Product page] {{â€¢}} [https://www.synology.com/en-global/products/RT1900ac#spec Specifications]
*"08-04ETB0113", "ETB01E5" and "Rev:1.3" is silkscreened on the board. *"08-04ETB0118", "ETB01L5" and "Rev:1.8" is silkscreened on the [https://ftp.smallnetbuilder.com/images/stories/wireless/synology_rt1900ac/synology_rt1900ac_board_r1_topsoff.jpg ''R1'' board].
Per the [https://fccid.io/YOR-RT1900AC FCC] EUT's label, a 00:11:32 OUI is assumed to be used for at least some devices.
===Reviews=== *[https://ftp.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32960-synology-rt1900ac-router-reviewed ''Synology RT1900ac Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32848-synology-formally-announces-its-wireless-router ''Synology Formally Announces Its Wireless Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://linuxgizmos.com/cortex-a9-soc-targets-linux-based-nas-devices-and-80211ac-routers/ BCM58622] @1GHz Dual-Core (ARM Cortex A9) :RAM: 256MB (DDR3), Flash: 4 GB (eMMC) + 1 MB (SPI [CFE]) :WLAN: 2x BCM43(4)60 radios, 3x external removable antennas :LAN: GbE 1x WAN and 4x LAN ports (embedded GbE switch) :USB/SD: 1x USB 3.0 port and SD card reader *[http://www.shadowandy.net/2015/10/synology-rt1900ac-review-introduction.htm ''Synology RT1900ac Review'' on '''ShadowAndy'''] :Processor: [[Broadcom]] BCM58622 (Dual Core @1GHz) :Memory: 256MB (DDR3), Flash: 1MB, Storage: 4GB (eMMC) :Switch: [[Broadcom]] BCM58622 (10/100/1000 Mbps) :Radio 2.4/5 GHz: 2x [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM43460 BCM43460] *[http://www.techbang.com/posts/39435-group-fai-netcom-markets-the-first-step-the-introduction-of-rt1900ac-wireless-router ''Synology RT1900ac Review'' on '''Techbang'''] :Flash: [[STMicroelectronics]] 25P80VG :USB 2.0 Dual SD/MMC/MS Card Reader Controller: [http://www.genesyslogic.com/jp/product_view.php?show=7 Genesys GL836] *[http://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/pozostale/synology-router-rt1900ac-r248/ ''Synology RT1900ac Review'' on '''Openitforum'''] *[https://lesterchan.net/blog/2015/12/14/synology-router-rt1900ac-review/ ''Synology RT1900ac Review'' on '''LesterChan''']
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/synology-rt1900ac.27166/ ''Synology RT1900AC'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/archive/2456071 ''Synology RT1900ac'' on '''Whirlpool''' forums] *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/internet-bandwidth-networking-clinic-4/synology-wireless-router-rt1900ac-dual-band-1-9gbps-5015329.html ''Synology RT1900ac'' on '''HardwareZone''' forums] *[http://www.mobile01.com/newsdetail.php?id=17430 ''Synology RT1900ac'' on '''Mobile01''' forums] :Flash: [[Winbond]] [http://www.datasheet4u.com/datasheet-pdf/Winbond/25P80/pdf.php?id=718369 W25P80VG] 1MB (8Mb) SPI :[[Toshiba]] [http://toshiba.semicon-storage.com/eu/product/memory/nand-flash/mlc-nand/emmc.html THGBMBG5D1KBAIT] 4GB (32Mb) eMMC *[http://digiland.tw/viewtopic.php?id=2741 ''Synology RT1900ac'' on '''DigiLand''' forums]
